step: Set viewport size to width 1080 and height 1440
Visit URL assigned to variable "app.url"
Echo: "--> Handle cookie consent and navigate to the login form"
Click on HO CAPITO button
Click on LOGIN button
GenAI Assert: The username and password input fields are visible on the page.
Assert that input field with placeholder text Nome utente is on the page
Assert that input field with placeholder text Password is on the page
Echo: "--> Log in with provided credentials"
Set variable "username" to "**USERNAME**"
Set variable "password" to "**PASSWORD**"
Enter text "{{@username}}" in Nome utente input field
Enter text "{{@password}}" in Password input field
Click on Accedi button
Click on Valutazione link with handshake icon in the left navigation menu
Click on Sistemi di valutazione link in the left navigation menu
Assert that dropdown menu with label 'STAI OPERANDO COME' is on the page
Echo: "--> Navigate to 'Sistemi di Valutazione'"
Assert that Dropdown menu with label 'STAI OPERANDO COME' is on the page
Echo: "--> Select 'Valutato - Area non it' from the dropdown and validate personnel"
Click on input field with label STAI OPERANDO COME
Click on text input field with current value 'Valutato - Area non it'
Assert that text '**USERNAME**' under 'Persona valutata' header is on the page
Echo: "--> Proceed to next screen and interact with sections"
Click on right arrow icon next to 'Commenti del val...'
Click on first 'SEZIONE TEST 2025 - SE' button
Click on second 'SEZIONE TEST 2025 - SE' button
GenAI Assert: The list of texts 'Impegno Concretezza Resilieneza Versatilità Fiducia Collaborazione Disponibilità Atteggiamento Efficacia' is displayed on the screen.
Click on the dropdown for 'Collaborazione' with selected value 3
Click on the dropdown for 'Atteggiamento' with selected value 5
Click on option with text '3' in the dropdown for Collaborazione
Click on option with text '5' in the dropdown for Atteggiamento
Enter text "3" in dropdown with current value 3 for Collaborazione
Enter text "5" in dropdown with current value 5 for Atteggiamento
